text: "Hole in My Soul" is a 1997 song by American hard rock band Aerosmith and is taken from their 12th studio album Nine Lives. It went to number 51 in the United States, number 29 in the United Kingdom and number 4 in Latvia. ==Track listing== ===Hole in My Soul - yellow - 450124=== ===Hole in My Soul - red - 450155=== == References == Category:1997 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:Hard rock songs Category:Aerosmith songs
title: Hole in My Soul
